title: Waring Pro RPC175WS Brushed Stainless Steel Wine Chiller and Warmer, Black
features: Library of 33 preset wine temperatures for cooling/warming (microprocessor internal database of red, white and champagne wines)

description: Keep a bottle of wine or champagne at the precise serving temperature experts recommend with the Waring Pro Wine Chiller/Warmer that features 33 professional temperature controls. The DF175 accommodates bottles up to 3 1/2" in diameter. You can count on elegant options from Waring Pro that has been making products for commercial kitchens for over 60 years.
